scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run text --prefix client
